title: Cage Platform CrewAI Agents Test - Emoji Hello World
summary: Test Cage platform's CrewAI multi-agent capabilities by having agents create and enhance a hello world app with emojis.

success_criteria.text: CrewAI agents successfully create initial hello world app
Agents enhance the app to include emojis in the output
Platform performance metrics are captured and documented
All agent capabilities are tested (planning, implementation, review, commit)

acceptance_checks.text: CrewAI agents generate a complete plan for emoji hello world app
Agents create hello_world.py file with emoji functionality
App runs successfully and outputs 'Hello, World!' with emojis
Agents commit changes to git repository
Multi-agent workflow performance metrics are documented

subtasks: Start Cage platform service for CrewAI test

todo.text: Start Cage platform service for CrewAI test

changelog.text: CrewAI emoji test task created - testing multi-agent capabilities
Cage platform service started on port 8006
Service health check passed - ready for CrewAI testing

prompts.text: Expand on the previous test and adjust the hello_world.py script to include emojis when saying hello world. Remember: the most important metric is that the crewai agents do the work themselves.
prompts.context: User requested CrewAI multi-agent test with emoji enhancement
